title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5004.5 - Number and amount of prizes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5004.5 - Number and amount of prizes

State Regulations

For each lottery game, the commission shall designate the
number and type of prizes to be awarded. The number of winners in each drawing
may vary depending upon game design, the distribution of tickets sold, the
number of tickets sold, and the number of valid winning tickets
claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5004.5

Amended

New

York State Register April 10, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 15, eff. 4/10/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
